name: Into the Depths (Goiaba Games)
description:
Your beloved has been kidnapped by monsters from underground.

Now it's up to you to arm yourself to the teeth and jump into the holes to the deepest recesses of the earth!

------------------------------

WASD to move

Left mouse to aim and shoot

1 to select machine gun, 2 for sniper rifle and 3 for rocket launcher (need ammo)

------------------------------

There are 15 leves in the game, it will take you 15 minutes or less to complete it

This is my very first game, any feedback is appreciated! ;)
